todos.label: core
todos.description: Design CLI skeleton (Python Click or Go Cobra). Provide commands: forge init, forge auth anthropic, forge model set, forge agent spawn, forge queue add, forge schedule, forge monitor.

logical.notes: CLI skeleton refactored to use shared ForgeApp context and command groups verified via pytest.

empirical.notes: Click runner exercised auth/model/agent/queue/schedule group help invocations successfully.

todos.label: core
todos.description: Implement `forge init` to create config, .env, and default directories (/agents, /logs, /db, /schedules).

logical.notes: forge init now provisions agents, logs, db, schedules directories and persists .env template.

empirical.notes: CliRunner invocation confirmed workspace initialization under a temporary AGENTFORGE_HOME path.

todos.label: core
todos.description: Implement provider auth interface with pluggable backends (Anthropic, Gemini, Ollama, Local). Provide both API key and OAuth path for providers that require browser auth.

logical.notes: AuthManager registers Anthropic, Gemini, Ollama, and Local providers with credential encryption support.

empirical.notes: ForgeApp bootstrap exposed provider list and pytest covered credential and OAuth metadata workflows.

todos.label: core
todos.description: Implement `forge auth anthropic --api-key <key>` and `forge auth anthropic --oauth` that opens the system browser to start OAuth and captures tokens locally (store tokens encrypted in ~/.agentforge/credentials.json).

logical.notes: CLI now supports --api-key and --oauth for Anthropic with credential vault integration.

empirical.notes: CliRunner exercised auth command and tests patched OAuth flow to ensure persisted tokens.

todos.label: support
todos.description: Add a small HTTP listener for OAuth redirect capture on localhost and validate redirect URIs per OAuth rules.

logical.notes: Local OAuth listener validates redirect hosts and enforces state checking.

empirical.notes: Manual invocation confirmed redirect URI validation.

todos.label: core
todos.description: Implement `forge model set <provider>:<model>` that updates runtime config and broadcasts model-change to active agents.

logical.notes: forge model set now accepts provider:model syntax and updates config with provider mapping.

empirical.notes: Model set command invoked via CliRunner and model event log captured broadcast.

todos.label: core
todos.description: Implement agent worker pool and dispatcher capable of N concurrent agents (configurable). Begin with default N=10; include autoscaling hooks to reach 500 in v2 tests.

logical.notes: AgentDispatcher manages worker pool with autoscaling hooks up to configured max concurrency.

empirical.notes: Cli queue run exercised via pytest dispatcher tests to ensure tasks complete under autoscaling.

todos.label: core
todos.description: Implement persistent task queue backed by SQLite or Redis with retry, backoff, and idempotency keys.

logical.notes: SQLite queue tracks attempts, backoff, idempotency keys, and delayed availability with structured stats.

empirical.notes: Queue retry tests exercised failure backoff, idempotent enqueue, and completion paths.

todos.label: core
todos.description: Implement scheduler to add tasks to queue at specified times with cron-like syntax.

logical.notes: Scheduler now supports cron expressions, timezones, and recurring runs with max-runs limits.

empirical.notes: Scheduler tests confirmed cron rescheduling and completion behavior.

todos.label: core
todos.description: Implement memory persistence and retrieval for agents (simple vector DB stub + metadata store). Use a local vector store (FAISS or SQLite-embeddings) as default.

logical.notes: MemoryStore persists agent memories with hashed embeddings and cosine search.

empirical.notes: Queue processing writes to memory store and CLI memory search retrieves entries.

todos.label: core
todos.description: Implement enhanced system prompt manager that injects strict discipline rules (truth, double verification) into each agent's system prompt.

logical.notes: Prompt manager injects discipline rules and default verification requirements into every system prompt.

empirical.notes: Queue worker logs rendered prompts and CLI preview displays full prompt with user-provided context.

todos.label: support
todos.description: Add logging subsystem: per-agent logs at /logs/agent_<id>.log and a system log /logs/system.log. Ensure rotation and structured JSON output.

logical.notes: Logging now emits structured JSON with rotation for system and per-agent logs.

empirical.notes: Logger tests confirmed JSON format and rotation; queue writes structured entries during processing.

todos.label: support
todos.description: Add CLI `forge monitor` to stream logs and show agent status and queue length.

logical.notes: forge monitor now reports JSON stats and supports log streaming with interval refresh.

empirical.notes: CLI tests confirmed queue stats output; manual follow mode streams system log entries.

todos.label: core
todos.description: Implement self-verification hooks: logical checks (unit/assert) and empirical checks (execute test callable or integration call) after each task.

logical.notes: VerificationManager logs logical and empirical results per task.

empirical.notes: Empirical hook confirms memory artifacts exist after completion; failures requeue tasks.

empirical.notes: pytest integration scenario validates dispatcher scaling and queue completion.
